CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( DMS_Doc_Id__c ) == TRUE, "", HYPERLINK("/lightning/action/quick/Document_BFI__c.Preview_Document?objectApiName&context=RECORD_DETAIL&recordId=" & CASESAFEID(Id) & "&backgroundContext=%2Flightning%2Fr%2FApplication__c%2F" & "" & "%2Fview&retUrl=", Lead__r.Lead_ID__c & Loan__r.Account.Lead_ID__c & "_" & Document_Type_Lookup__r.type__c & "_" & TEXT( DATEVALUE(LastModifiedDate) ), "_self"))
CustomField.label: Link
